DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether text message support after discharge from a bariatric service improves outcomes following bariatric surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Does Text Message Support After Discharge Improve Outcomes Following Bariatric Surgery? A Randomised Trial.
DOC.criteria: All patients who have had a sleeve gastrectomy 18 months ago and are attending the discharge followup appointment Patients who do not have the ability to receive text messages Patients who do not understand written English
